application.paragraph: Learnerapp is an application aiming to improve your learning effectiveness. It uses modificated SM-2 algorithm to maximise your learning progress. You can use it when you are learning any language, historical dates or as help in differents fields of science or when you just want to be better at recognizing things/people by photos.

flashcards.paragraph: Flashcards are cards containing various informations on front and back side of a card. Usually they are used as study aid when studying systematically. As an aid card have a question on front side and on the back there is an answer.

tutorial.paragraph: To start learning process you should add category and cards in Start menu, after that you can start revise them!
